Chronological List of Presidents, First Spouses, and Vice Presidents of the United States YEAR PRESIDENT VICE PRESIDENT 1973-1974 Richard M. Nixon Gerald R. Ford 1974-1977 Gerald R. Ford Nelson Rockefeller 1977-1981 Jimmy Carter Walter F. Mondale 1981-1989 Ronald Reagan George H. W. Bush
Who was the President of the United States from 1973 to 1977? Lucy Baines Johnson US President

Luci was born in Washington, D.C. , She is the younger daughter of U.S. President Lyndon B. Johnson and his wife, former First Lady Lady Bird Johnson. Since 1993, Johnson has been the Chairman of the Board and manager of LBJ Asset Management Partners, a family office, as well as Chairman of the Board of BusinesSuites.

detail.reasoning: The text claims that Luci Baines Johnson was the President of the United States from 1973 to 1977. However, the evidence provided lists the U.S. Presidents during that period as Richard M. Nixon (1973-1974), Gerald R. Ford (1974-1977), and Jimmy Carter (starting in 1977). Additionally, Luci Baines Johnson is identified as the daughter of President Lyndon B. Johnson and not as a President herself. Therefore, the claim in the text is factually incorrect.
detail.error: The text incorrectly states that Luci Baines Johnson was the President of the United States from 1973 to 1977.
detail.correction: Luci Baines Johnson is the daughter of U.S. President Lyndon B. Johnson and was not a President of the United States.
